title: Mark of Shadow Elf
entryLore: The Mark of Shadow grants power over illusion and darkness. House Phiarlan and House Thuranni both carry this mark, though the houses split centuries ago. Originally entertainers and artists, the houses now also provide espionage services. Elves with the Mark of Shadow are masters of deception, able to weave illusions and slip through shadows unseen.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.description: You have [[advantage]] on saving throws against being [[charmed]], and magic can't put you to sleep.

traits.name: Trance
traits.description: You don't need to sleep. Instead, you meditate deeply for 4 hours a day. After resting in this way, you gain the same benefit that a human does from 8 hours of sleep.

traits.name: Keen Senses
traits.description: You have proficiency in the [[perception|Perception]] skill.

traits.name: Cunning Intuition
traits.description: When you make a Charisma ([[performance|Performance]]) or Dexterity ([[stealth|Stealth]]) check, you can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to the ability check.

traits.name: Shape Shadows
traits.description: You know the [[minor_illusion|Minor Illusion]] cantrip. Starting at 3rd level, you can cast the [[invisibility|Invisibility]] spell once with this trait, and you regain the ability to cast it when you finish a [[long_rest|Long Rest]]. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

traits.name: Spells of the Mark
traits.description: If you have the Spellcasting or Pact Magic class feature, the spells on the Mark of Shadow Spells table are added to the spell list of your spellcasting class.
